description:
go.tools/ssa: combine CallCommon.{Recv,Func} as Value.

Also:
- add types.Func.FullName() (e.g. "fmt.Println", "(main.S).f")
- remove rogue print stmt.
- fix bad docstrings.

Done.

Done.

Also:

- remove rogue print stmt.
- fix bad docstrings.
